requirements:

- Excellent communication and teamwork skills, with a problem-solving attitude.

- Passion for video games is highly desirable.
title: Fullstack Developer expert in Typescript and React
jobMission: We are seeking an expert Fullstack Developer proficient in Typescript and React to join our dynamic team at Softubi. The successful candidate will play a pivotal role in developing cutting-edge gaming software and contribute to the continuous evolution of our gaming systems. You will be part of a vibrant team dedicated to delivering high-quality experiences to our global user base. This role provides an excellent opportunity to leverage your technical skills and be part of our innovative journey in the gaming industry.
responsibilities:
- Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Typescript and React code to deliver top-notch gaming experiences.
- Work collaboratively with a team of developers, designers, and project managers to drive project success.
- Analyze user requirements and convert them into robust software solutions.
- Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the applications.
- Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to these problems.
- Engage in peer code reviews, provide constructive feedback, and share best practices.
- Participate in Agile development practices such as Scrum and Sprint planning.
